Docs.summary: Contains helper methods for authenticating incoming HTTP requests.

Docs.summary: Authenticates the request and adds the activity's to the set of trusted URLs.
Docs.returns: A task that represents the work queued to execute.
Docs.remarks: If the task completes successfully, the result contains the claims-based identity for the request.

MemberSignature.Value: public static string GetAppIdFromClaims (System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable<System.Security.Claims.Claim> claims);
.method public static hidebysig string GetAppIdFromClaims(class System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable`1<class System.Security.Claims.Claim> claims) cil managed
Public Shared Function GetAppIdFromClaims (claims As IEnumerable(Of Claim)) As String
static member GetAppIdFromClaims : seq<System.Security.Claims.Claim> -> string

Docs.summary: Gets the AppId from a claims list.
Docs.returns: The value of the appId claim if found (null if it can't find a suitable claim).
Docs.remarks: In v1 tokens the AppId is in the the claim. In v2 tokens the AppId is in the azp claim. If the is not present, this method will attempt to obtain the attribute from the or if present.
